title: Postman Pat takes a bus
brief_description: Pat is late home for tea after taking a group of passengers over to Ingledale in his new Post bus. Along the way they get lost and Pat needs to use his wits to get them all home safely. Also includes “Postman Pat and the Magpie Hen” featuring a naughty hen that decides to ‘borrow’ the keys to Pat’s van.
